mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.kd_id AS "cmsProductKind.id", a.pd_order AS "pdOrder", a.pd_name AS "pdName", a.pd_nm AS "pdNm", a.pd_introduce AS "pdIntroduce", a.pd_img AS "pdImg", a.pd_file AS "pdFile", a.pd_mv AS "pdMv", a.pd_title1 AS "pdTitle1", a.pd_intr1 AS "pdIntr1", a.pd_title2 AS "pdTitle2", a.pd_intr2 AS "pdIntr2", a.pd_title3 AS "pdTitle3", a.pd_intr3 AS "pdIntr3", a.pd_title4 AS "pdTitle4", a.pd_intr4 AS "pdIntr4", a.pd_title5 AS "pdTitle5", a.pd_intr5 AS "pdIntr5", a.pd_title6 AS "pdTitle6", a.pd_intr6 AS "pdIntr6", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
